data.name: Russian Prison Tattoo Simulator
data.detailed_description:
Russian Prison Tattoo Simulator is a short point & click / narrative experience. You are an artist serving the sentence in the Russian prison. Your talents are in high demand among the inmates, each one of them wanting to have a commemorative tattoo about the time spent in prison. Make tough choices, apply proper tattoos or get punished for your mistakes. Can you survive in prison?

Enter the prison world

The prison life is tough. Meet other inmates and find out more about their backgrounds. Be careful with your words, for you have to take responsibility for everything you say.

Apply tattoos

Inmates have their needs and backgrounds. Try to find out what they want before choosing which tattoo to apply or get hurt if you make a mistake.

Discover the iconography behind Russian prison tattoos

Each tattoo has its own meaning, a person's tattoos speak louder than words.

Multiple endings

Depending on what you do and how well you apply tattoos, your adventure might end differently.

data.short_description: Become a tattoo artist in Russian Prison. Get introduced to tattoo iconography and special meanings of Russian Prison tattoos

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.4, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
The game is 16+: it takes place in prison and contains crude language; implied violence; prison social hierarchy and its consequences. 

There are no openly graphical depictions of violence (unless you consider black and white sketch of knife and puddle of blood graphical), but it is often implied.

There are no graphical sex scenes, but there are mentions and references of non-consensual sex, sexual assault or prison violence. There is a mention of an actual prison tattoo applied to molesters against their will. There is also a person who is forced to get such tattoo and the brief mention of this crime without any details. This is all kept in the dialogues and storytelling. There is a tattoo with swastika on it.
